Igor Ranitovic writes:
> Hi Tom,
> 
> Try adding '+' in front the rules. That will indicate to the crawler that the rules are SURTs.
> 
> For example
> +http://(com,age1116,
> and not
> http://(com,age1116,

I need to do this in the separate SURT file that I specify in the WUI?
I'm not including these with the seeds.
